snippet: The nation, condemned by a United Nations panel for gross human rights violations, issued its own report that made no mention of prison camps and claimed that individual freedoms were strong.
abstract: North Korea issues its own report on the state of human rights within its borders, disputing outside criticism and suggesting that accusations of abuses are political motivated; report neglects several issues cited in condemnation by the United Nations Human Rights Council.
lead_paragraph: The nation, condemned by a United Nations panel for gross human rights violations, issued its own report that made no mention of prison camps and claimed that individual freedoms were strong.

headline.main: North Korea Says Reports of Abuse Are Produced by Political ‘Racket’
headline.print_headline: North Korea Says Reports of Abuse Are Produced by Political ‘Racket’

keywords.value: Human Rights and Human Rights Violations
keywords.name: subject
